rules_text:
Reach
[i]Elegant Sniper[/i] – When Louise, Eternal Devotion enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying until end of turn.
[i]Loving Wife[/i] – Enchanted creatures you control have haste. Whenever an enchantment you control enters, draw a card.
Partner with Pent, Marquess of Reglay
